author: ghudson
msg: Work around the directory creation bug in the APR shipped with httpd
2.0.50.  Pulling on this thread also means fixing some character
encoding issues with the config dir.
(dir_make): If APR_OS_DEFAULT encompasses APR_WSTICKY, and we are
passed APR_OS_DEFAULT, unset the three bits erroneously included
of apr_dir_make, and svn_io_file_open instead of apr_file_open.
(main): UTF8-encode the config dir if one is specified.

author: philip
msg: pools like that is not thread safe.

author: fitz
msg: Add a comment about making an A4 book.
* doc/book/Makefile: Add commented out line for printing to A4 paper.

author: philip
msg: xlate handle in the parent pools before creating a new handle in the
